title: Replace Cake King site with single-page AI ebook sales landing page (WhatsApp CTA)

requirements.text: Replace the current single-page Cake King layout with a single-page sales landing page for the digital PDF ebook “Earn with AI from Zero to 10k” (price: ₹199), targeting beginners/students/side-income seekers in India, using the exact section order and headings specified by the user (Hero, Product Preview, Why Choose This Guide, Social Proof/Reviews, Final CTA, Footer).

quotes: Create a single-page sales website for a digital ebook.

acceptanceCriteria: The homepage renders exactly 6 sections in the order specified: Hero, Product Preview, Why Choose This Guide, Social Proof/Reviews, Final CTA, Footer
All user-facing text is in English and matches the user-provided headings/subheadings/reviews/disclaimer verbatim (except where the user left wording open-ended)

requirements.text: Implement the Hero section with: (a) a large, professional ebook cover image; (b) main heading “Earn Your First ₹10,000 with the Help of AI”; (c) subheading “Beginner-friendly • No Coding • Real Methods”; (d) a highlighted CTA button labeled “Contact on WhatsApp to Buy” that opens the provided WhatsApp click link in a new tab/window.

quotes: Show a large professional ebook cover image
Main Heading (bold, big): Earn Your First ₹10,000 with the Help of AI
Subheading: Beginner-friendly • No Coding • Real Methods
Call-to-Action Button (highlighted): Contact on WhatsApp to Buy (Button should open the WhatsApp link given above)

acceptanceCriteria: Hero CTA button opens exactly: https://wa.me/919279282274?text=Hi%20I%20want%20to%20buy%20the%20AI%20ebook
The ebook cover is visually prominent on mobile and desktop (no tiny thumbnail presentation)

requirements.text: Implement the Product Preview section with: (a) ebook image shown again at a smaller size; (b) price displayed clearly as “₹199 Only”; (c) one-line description “Learn simple, practical AI methods to start earning online from zero.”; (d) a CTA button labeled “Buy Now on WhatsApp” linking to the same WhatsApp click link.

quotes: One-line description: Learn simple, practical AI methods to start earning online from zero.
CTA button again: Buy Now on WhatsApp

acceptanceCriteria: The Product Preview section shows the price string exactly: “₹199 Only”
The Product Preview CTA opens exactly the provided WhatsApp link

requirements.text: Implement the “Why Choose This Guide?” section with the exact title and bullet points provided by the user.

quotes: Create a section titled: Why Choose This Guide?
Add bullet points like: Step-by-step AI earning methods for beginners ... Instant PDF delivery via WhatsApp

acceptanceCriteria: The section heading is exactly: “Why Choose This Guide?”
All five bullets are present and readable on mobile without overcrowding

requirements.text: Implement the Social Proof / Reviews section containing exactly 3 short reviews using the exact text provided by the user (including the star symbol).

quotes: ⭐ “Perfect for beginners who want to start with AI.”

acceptanceCriteria: Exactly three reviews are displayed
The review strings match the user-provided text verbatim

requirements.text: Implement the Final CTA section with: (a) big bold text “Start Your AI Journey Today”; (b) subtext “Limited price: ₹199”; (c) CTA button labeled “Contact on WhatsApp Now” linking to the provided WhatsApp click link.

quotes: Big bold text: Start Your AI Journey Today

acceptanceCriteria: Final CTA button opens exactly the provided WhatsApp link
Final CTA section is visually distinct from prior sections and clearly acts as the last conversion push

requirements.text: Replace the current Footer content with: (a) disclaimer text “Results depend on effort and consistency. This is a beginner-friendly guide, not a get-rich-quick scheme.”; (b) WhatsApp number displayed again as “+91 9279282274”.

quotes: Disclaimer text: Results depend on effort and consistency. This is a beginner-friendly guide, not a get-rich-quick scheme.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer shows the disclaimer sentence verbatim
Footer shows WhatsApp number verbatim: “+91 9279282274”

requirements.text: Ensure all WhatsApp CTAs throughout the page use the exact same WhatsApp click link provided by the user, and remove/replace any existing Cake King WhatsApp message text so no CTA opens the old bakery message.
acceptanceCriteria: No button/link in the UI opens a WhatsApp URL containing “Hello%20Cake%20King”
All WhatsApp CTAs open exactly: https://wa.me/919279282274?text=Hi%20I%20want%20to%20buy%20the%20AI%20ebook

requirements.text: Update the site styling to a clean, modern, professional “tech-style” look using a blue/green/white palette, readable typography, clear spacing, and mobile-first responsive layout optimized for conversions (prominent CTA buttons, clear section separation).

quotes: Focus on conversions and WhatsApp contact

acceptanceCriteria: Primary/CTA styling uses a consistent blue/green/white theme across all sections
All sections render cleanly on small screens without horizontal scrolling
Typography is legible (no overly light text on light backgrounds and no cramped line heights)

requirements.text: Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the page (ebook cover at minimum; any additional required images per imageRequirements). Do not serve these images from the backend.

quotes: Show a large professional ebook cover image

acceptanceCriteria: The ebook cover image loads from /assets/generated/… and is used in both Hero and Product Preview
No backend endpoints are added/used to fetch images

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui). Compose with existing UI components instead.
Keep backend as-is (single-actor Motoko). No backend changes are required for a static WhatsApp-CTA landing page.
nonGoals: Implementing payment processing, automated PDF delivery, or WhatsApp API automation (delivery is manual via WhatsApp after payment).
Exporting a Wix-specific project format; the deliverable is the React/Tailwind single-page app matching the requested structure and copy.

required: Professional 3D-style ebook cover design with a clean AI/tech theme in blue/green/white (ebook-cover.dim_1600x2400.png)
Abstract tech gradient background with subtle geometric/AI motifs in blue/green/white (hero-tech-bg.dim_1920x1080.jpg)
